greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients of polynomials D(n,x) related to median Euler numbers.
link: A. Randrianarivony and J. Zeng, Une famille de polynomes qui interpole plusieurs suites classiques de nombres, Adv. Appl. Math. 17 (1996), 1-26.
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} D(n,y)*x^n = Sum_{n>=0} n!*(2*x)^n*Product_{k=1..n} (k+y)/(1+k*(k+1)*x). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Sep 05 2012
mathematica: Table[CoefficientList[d[n, x], x] // Reverse, {n, 0, 8}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 27 2018 *)
xref: Leading coefficients are A000165. Constant terms are in A098431.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 07 2004
